name: Tribal & Error: Demo
description:
Tribal & ErrorAbout the game:

In Tribal & Error you're a robot sent back to observe the ancient times,

but the ice age is coming and to save humanity you need to learn their language first.

You'll observe, repeat and master the cavemen tongue.

Features:
  • Language learning mechanic
  • Unique caveman language
  • No language barrier
  • Challenging puzzles
  • Different puzzle solutions
Follow the development!

Twitter: @GrotmanGames

Website: www.tribalanderror.com

Facebook: Tribal & Error Facebook Page

Steam Greenlight: Greenlight Page (We've been Greenlit!)
